section.title: The Agreements Item Promotions help screen
section.para: This screen is used to enter or maintain any promotions that are associated with the Agreement Item. This can be useful if you want to limit where a particular promotion is applied. Promotions are setup in Catalog Manager and can be selected here.

section.title: How do I add a promotion to an agreement item?

listitem.para: The 'Edit Agreement Promo Applications' screen is displayed
Select the 'Product Promo Id' from the drop down box
Enter the 'Thru Date' if required (NOTE:This can be left blank)

section.title: How do I edit an existing promotion for an agreement item?

listitem.para: Select the agreement item promotion by clicking on on the promotion id
The 'Edit Agreement Promo Applications' screen is displayed

section.title: How do I delete a promotion from an agreement item?

listitem.para: Press the 'Remove' button on the entry that needs to be deleted.
